alert.note: Alert for Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Grady; Kingfisher; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 6:13AM CDT until July 07 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Washita County in western Oklahoma... Kingfisher County in central Oklahoma... Northwestern Grady County in central Oklahoma... Northern Caddo County in southwestern Oklahoma... Southeastern Custer County in western Oklahoma... Blaine County in northwestern Oklahoma... Canadian County in central Oklahoma... * Until 700 AM CDT. * At 612 AM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 4 miles southeast of Longdale to 8 miles southeast of Fay to 3 miles northwest of Bessie, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... El Reno, Weatherford, Clinton, Watonga, Kingfisher, Cordell, Hinton, Hennessey, Carnegie, Union City, Geary, Okarche, Okeene, Hydro, Binger, Fort Cobb, Calumet, Corn, Dover, and Eakly. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Blaine; Caddo; Canadian; Custer; Grady; Kingfisher; Washita
